lead_paragraph: Two years ago, the Australian IOC member John Coates called the preparations for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics "the worst" in recent memory.

headline.print_headline: Best and Worst of Times: Rio Olympic Countdown Hits 100 Days
headline.main: Best and Worst of Times: Rio Olympic Countdown Hits 100 Days
